title: Collaborative Learning Assessment Barrier Mitigation and Problem-Solving Skill Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Mathematics Knowledge and Digital Device Usage Proficiency
context.additional_context: Focuses on analyzing and resolving collaborative learning barriers through real-life problem-solving activities in smartphone-based microlearning environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain three major barriers that occur during collaborative learning processes.
Learners practice effective role distribution among team members while solving real-world math problems using a PBL (Problem-Based Learning) approach.
Learners create, share, and conduct self/peer assessments of collaborative learning outcomes using smartphone-based tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
